quote: It is our choices that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: I’m not afraid... I was BORN for this!
author: Joan of Arc

quote: Whatever you are willing to put up with is exactly what you will have.
author: Anonymous

quote: We are what we imagine. Our very existence consists in our imagination of ourselves. The greatest tragedy that can befall us is to go unimagined.
author: N. Scott Momaday

quote: There is a fire inside. Sit down beside it. Watch the flames, the ancient, flickering dance of yourself.
author: John MacEnulty

quote: Destiny is not a matter of chance, it is a matter of choice. It is not a thing to be waited for, it is a thing to be achieved.
author: William Jennings Bryan

quote: I have always known that at last I would take this road, but yesterday I did not know that it would be today.
author: Japanese Haiku

quote: There is no chance, no destiny, no fate that can circumvent or hinder or control the firm resolve of a determined soul.
author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quote: Life is not discovery of fate; it is continuous creation of future, through choices of thoughts, feelings and actions in the present.
author: Sanjay Sahay

quote: You were born an original. Don’t die a copy.
author: John Mason

quote: Is life not a hundred times too short for us to stifle ourselves?
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: There is only one real failure in life that is possible, and that is not to be true to the best one knows.
author: John Farrar

quote: The pen that writes your life story must be held in your own hand.
author: Irene C. Kassorla

quote: Every choice before you represents the universe inviting you to remember who you are and what you want.
author: Alan Cohen

quote: Men weary as much of not doing the things they want to do as of doing the things they do not want to do.
author: Eric Hoffer

quote: Nothing truly valuable arises from ambition or from a mere sense of duty; it stems rather from love and devotion towards men and towards objective things.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: To serve is beautiful, but only if it is done with joy and a whole heart.
author: Pearl S. Buck

quote: How do we keep our inner fire alive? Two things, at minimum, are needed: an ability to appreciate the positives in our life - and a commitment to action.
author: Nathaniel Branden

quote: Let him who would enjoy a good future waste none of his present.
author: Roger Babson

quote: The path to our destination is not always a straight one. We go down the wrong road, we get lost, we turn back. Maybe it doesn’t matter which road we embark on. Maybe what matters is that we embark.
author: Barbara Hall

quote: It takes great courage to faithfully follow what we know to be true.
author: Sara E. Anderson

quote: Our background and circumstances may have influenced who we are, but we are responsible for who we become.
author: Barbara Geraci

quote: Great thoughts speak only to the thoughtful mind, but great actions speak to all Mankind.
author: Emily P. Bissell

quote: There is a criterion by which you can judge whether the thoughts you are thinking and the things you are doing are right for you. The criterion is: Have they brought you inner peace?
author: The Peace Pilgrim

quote: There is more in us than we know. If we can be made to see it, perhaps, for the rest of our lives, we will be unwilling to settle for less.
author: Kurt Hahn

quote: From long familiarity, we know what honor is. It is what enables the individual to do right in the face of complacency and cowardice. It is what enables the soldier to die alone, the political prisoner to resist, the singer to sing her song, hardly appreciated, on a side street.
author: Mark Helprin

quote: We all live under the same sky, but we don’t all have the same horizon.
author: Konrad Adenauer

quote: If it doesn’t feel right, don’t do it. That is the lesson, and that lesson alone will save you a lot of grief.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: The time is always right to do what is right.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: Time is the coin of your life. It is the only coin you have, and only you can determine how it will be spent. Be careful lest you let other people spend it for you.
author: Carl Sandburg

quote: The goal of childhood is to become an individual; the goal of adulthood is to give that individuality away. The task of childhood is to separate; the task of adulthood is to connect.
author: James W. Jones

quote: The best career advice to give the young is, find out what you like doing best and get someone else to pay you for doing it.
author: Katherine Whilehaen

quote: The gem cannot be polished without friction nor man without trials.
author: Confucius

quote: Hands that serve are holier than lips that pray.
author: Sai Baba

quote: You will recognize your own path when you come upon it, because you will suddenly have all the energy and imagination you will ever need.
author: Jerry Gillies

quote: Destiny is not a matter of chance, it is a matter of choice. It is not a thing to be waited for, it is a thing to be achieved.
author: Jeremy Kitson

quote: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.
author: Mohandas K. Gandhi

quote: The height of your accomplishments will equal the depth of your convictions.
author: William F. Scolavino

quote: I think the purpose of life is to be useful, to be responsible, to be honorable, to be compassionate. It is, after all, to matter: to count, to stand for something, to have made some difference that you lived at all.
author: Leo C. Rosten

quote: Toil and risk are the price of glory, but it is a lovely thing to live with courage and die leaving an everlasting fame.
author: Alexander the Great

quote: To give real service you must add something which cannot be bought or measured with money, and that is sincerity and integrity.
author: Donald A. Adams

quote: Dignity and respect has to do with ... your personal power to make a difference by being true to the best within you and letting that truth shine through your words and actions.
author: Gail Pursell Elliott

quote: When you are inspired by some great purpose, some extraordinary project, all your thoughts break their bonds: Your mind transcends limitations, your consciousness expands in every direction, and you find yourself in a new, great, and wonderful world. Dormant forces, faculties and talents become alive, and you discover yourself to be a greater person by far than you ever dreamed yourself to be.
author: Patanjali

quote: Seek out that particular mental attribute which makes you feel most deeply and vitally alive, along with which comes the inner voice which says, ‘This is the real me,’ and when you have found that attitude, follow it.
author: William James

quote: When you see what you’re here for, the world begins to mirror your purpose in a magical way. It’s almost as if you suddenly find yourself on a stage in a play that was written expressly for you.
author: Betty Sue Flowers

quote: We seek purpose when we are not in touch with who we really are. When an apple tree discovers who it is, the question ‘what must I do?’ disappears. When you discover who you are (at the deepest place of your being) you will find your purpose.
author: Colleen-Joy Page

quote: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life and don’t let the noise of others’ opinions drown out your own inner voice. Most important, have the courage to follow your heart and intuition. They somehow already know what you truly want to become.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Too many people overvalue what they are not and undervalue what they are.
author: Malcolm Forbes

quote: People who consider themselves victims of their circumstances will always remain victims unless they develop a greater vision for their lives.
author: Stedman Graham

quote: I want to sing like the birds sing, not worrying about who hears or what they think.
author: Rumi

quote: Love without action is meaningless and action without love is irrelevant.
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: Let yourself be silently drawn by the stronger pull of what you really love.
author: Rumi

quote: Having a vision for your life allows you to live out of hope, rather than out of your fears.
author: Stedman Graham

quote: To understand the heart and mind of a person, look not at what he has already achieved, but at what he aspires to do.
author: Kahlil Gibran

quote: I don’t know what your destiny will be, but one thing I know: the only ones among you who will be truly happy are those who have sought and found how to serve.
author: Albert Schweitzer

quote: If you want to know the past, to know what has caused you, look at yourself in the PRESENT, for that is the past’s effect. If you want to know your future, then look at yourself in the PRESENT, for that is the cause of the future.
author: Majjhima Nikaya

quote: All of life is a near-death experience.
author: Alan Harris

quote: When you were born, you cried and the world rejoiced. Live your life so that when you die, the world cries and you rejoice.
author: Cherokee Expression

quote: There is a time to let things happen, and a time to make things happen.
author: Anonymous

quote: Life is what happens when you are making other plans.
author: John Lennon

quote: Circumstance does not make the man. Circumstance reveals man to himself.
author: Emerson

quote: Time is too slow for those who wait, too swift for those who fear, too long for those who grieve, too short for those who rejoice, but for those who love, time is eternity.
author: Henry Van Dyke

quote: Truly loving another means letting go of all expectations. It means full acceptance, even celebration of another’s personhood.
author: Karen Casey

quote: It is not how much we do, but how much love we put in the doing. It is not how much we give, but how much love we put in the giving.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: People take different roads seeking fulfillment and happiness. Just because they’re not on your road doesn’t mean they’ve gotten lost.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: We look forward to the time when the Power of Love will replace the Love of Power. Then will our world know the blessings of Peace.
author: William E. Gladstone

quote: We don’t stop playing because we grow old; we grow old because we stop playing.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: I’ve come to believe that each of us has a personal calling that’s as unique as a fingerprint - and that the best way to succeed is to discover what you love and then find a way to offer it to others in the form of service, working hard, and also allowing the energy of the universe to lead you.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: The purpose of life is not to fight against evil and misfortune; it is to unveil magnificence.
author: Alan Cohen

quote: A ship in harbor is safe, but that is not what ships are for.
author: John A. Shedd

quote: One ship sails East, And another West, By the self-same winds that blow, Tis the set of the sails And not the gales, That tells the way we go. Like the winds of the sea Are the waves of time, As we journey along through life, Tis the set of the soul, That determines the goal, And not the calm or the strife.
author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quote: You often meet your destiny on the road you’ve taken to avoid it.
author: Anonymous

quote: Every positive change - every jump to a higher level of energy and awareness - involves a rite of passage. Each time to ascend to a higher rung on the ladder of personal evolution, we must go through a period of discomfort, of initiation. I have never found an exception.
author: Dan Millman

quote: There is a vitality, a life force, an energy that is translated through you; and because there is only one of you in all of time, this expression is unique.
author: Martha Graham

quote: Your vision will become clear only when you can look into your own heart. Who looks outside, dreams, who looks inside awakes.
author: Carl Gustav Jung

quote: We can’t change the wind, but we can adjust the sails.
author: Anonymous

quote: The meaning of life is to give life meaning.
author: Ken Hudgins

quote: Everyone has a purpose in life... a unique gift or special talent to give to others. And when we blend this unique talent with service to others, we experience the ecstasy and exultation of our own spirit, which is the ultimate goal of all goals.
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: It’s never too late to be what you might have been.
author: George Elliot

quote: Life’s like a movie; write your own ending, keep believing, keep pretending...
author: Jim Henson

quote: Life has meaning only if you do what is meaningful to you.
author: Alan Cohen

quote: Life is a daring adventure or it is nothing at all.
author: Helen Keller

quote: There is no security in this life. There is only opportunity.
author: Douglas MacArthur

quote: It may be that when we no longer know what to do, we have come to our real work, and when we no longer know which way to go, we have begun our real journey.
author: Wendell Berry

quote: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn’t do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbour. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Don’t ask yourself what the world needs; ask yourself what makes you come alive. And then go and do that. Because what the world needs is people who have come alive.
author: Harold Whitman

quote: The only limits to the possibilities in your life tomorrow are the buts you use today.
author: Les Brown

quote: When you are inspired by some great purpose, some extraordinary project, all your thoughts break their bounds. Dormant forces, faculties and talents become alive, and you discover yourself to be a greater person by far than you ever dreamed yourself to be.
author: Pantanjali

quote: Nothing happens unless first a dream.
author: Carl Sandburg

quote: Strange is our situation here upon earth. Each of us comes for a short visit, not knowing why, yet sometimes seeming to divine a purpose. From the standpoint of daily life, however, there is one thing we do know - that man is here for the sake of other men.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Man is not a being who stands still, he is a being in the process of becoming. The more he enables himself to become, the more he fulfills his true mission.
author: Rudolph Steiner

quote: The person without a purpose is like a ship without a rudder.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: Your vision will become clear only when you look into your heart. Who looks outside, dreams. Who looks inside, awakens.
author: Carl Jung

quote: He who waits to do a great deal of good at once, will never do anything.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
author: Mahatma Ghandi

quote: A man is ethical only when life, as such, is sacred to him, that of plants and animals as that of his fellow men, and when he devotes himself helpfully to all life that is in need of help.
author: George Orwell

quote: It is never too late to become what you might have been.
author: George Elliot

quote: I had found a kind of serenity, a new maturity... I didn’t feel better or stronger than anyone else but it seemed no longer important whether everyone loved me or not —more important now was for me to love them. Feeling that way turns your whole life around; living becomes the act of giving.
author: Beverly Sills

quote: Life isn’t about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: A good traveler has no fixed plans, and is not intent on arriving.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Be ready when opportunity comes.... Luck is when preparation and opportunity meet.
author: Roy D. Chapin Jr.

quote: Sooner or later, those who win are those who think they can.
author: Richard Bach

quote: For myself I am an optimist - it does not seem to be much use being anything else.
author: Sir Winston Churchill

quote: What a wonderful life I’ve had! I only wish I’d realized it sooner.
author: Colette

quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Let us rise up and be thankful, for Gratitude is not only the greatest of virtues, but the parent of all the others.
author: Cicero

quote: Both abundance and lack exist simultaneously in our lives, as parallel realities. It is always our conscious choice which secret garden we will tend... when we choose to be grateful for the abundance that’s present -- love, health, family, friends, work, the joys of nature and personal pursuits that bring us pleasure -- the wasteland of lack falls away and we experience heaven on Earth.
author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

quote: The height of your accomplishments is determined by the depth of your convictions.
author: William F. Scolavino

quote: There are three kinds of people: those who let it happen, those who make it happen, and those who wonder what happened.
author: John Richardson

quote: It is not in everyone’s power to secure wealth, office, or honors; but everyone may be good, generous, and wise.
author: Luc De Clapiers

quote: If you’re never scared or embarrassed or hurt, it means you never take any chances.
author: Julia Sore

quote: Being defeated is often only a temporary condition. Giving up is what makes it permanent.
author: Marilyn vos Savan

quote: Some people say I have attitude - maybe I do. But I think you have to. You have to believe in yourself when no one else does - that makes you a winner right there.
author: Venus Williams, US tennis champion

quote: The tragedy of life doesn’t lie in not reaching your goal. The tragedy lies in having no goal to reach.
author: Benjamin E. Mayes

quote: Education is the great engine of personal development. It is through education that the daughter of a peasant can become a doctor, that the son of a mineworker can become the head of the mine, that a child of farm workers can become the president of a great nation. It is what we make out of what we have, not what we are given, that separates one person from another.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: View money and things not as something you create to fill a lack, but as tools to help you more fully express yourself and realize your potential.
author: Sanaya Roman and Duane Packer

quote: Abilities wither under faultfinding, blossom with encouragement.
author: Donald A. Laird

quote: We have to do the best we can. This is our sacred human responsibility.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: When we feel stuck, going nowhere - even starting to slip backward - we may actually be backing up to get a running start.
author: Dan Millman

quote: What is opportunity, and when does it knock? It never knocks. You can wait a whole lifetime, listening, hoping, and you will hear no knocking. None at all. You are opportunity, and you must knock on the door leading to your destiny.
author: Maxwell Maltz

quote: Learn to expect, not to doubt. In so doing, you bring everything into the realm of possibility.
author: Dr. Norman Vincent Peale

quote: Go out looking for one thing, and that’s all you’ll ever find.
author: Robert Flaherty

quote: An investment in knowledge pays the best dividends.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: The journey of a thousand miles must begin with a small step.
author: Chinese Proverb

quote: A wise man should have money in his head, but not in his heart.
author: Jonathan Swift

quote: Integrity is the essence of everything successful.
author: R. Buckminster Fuller

quote: Money - like health, love, happiness, and all forms of success that you want to create for yourself - is the result of living purposefully. It is not a goal unto itself.
author: Dr. Wayne Dyer

quote: The gratification of wealth is not found in mere possession or in lavish expenditure, but in its wise application.
author: Miguel de Cervantes

quote: The real measure of your wealth is how much you’d be worth if you lost all your money.
author: unknown

quote: I believe life is a series of near misses. A lot of what we ascribe to luck is not luck at all. It’s seizing the day and accepting responsibility for your future. It’s seeing what other people don’t see and pursuing that vision.
author: Howard Schultz

quote: Most powerful is he who has himself in his own power.
author: Seneca

quote: Winners are losers who got up and gave it one more try.
author: Dennis DeYoung

quote: Either you deal with what is the reality or you can be sure that the reality is going to deal with you.
author: Alex Haley

quote: Unless you try to do something beyond what you have already mastered, you will never grow.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The greater danger for most of us is not that our aim is too high and we miss it, but that it is too low and we reach it.
author: Michelangelo Buonarroti

quote: Life is not measured by its length, but by its depth.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The people who get on in this world are the people who get up and look for the circumstances they want and if they can’t find them, they make them.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: There is one quality which one must possess to win, and that is definiteness of purpose, the knowledge of what one wants, and a burning desire to possess it.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: I can’t change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination.
author: Jimmy Dean

quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
author: Herman Cain

quote: A pessimist is one who makes difficulties of opportunities. An optimist makes opportunities of so-called difficulties.
author: Anonymous

quote: Action is a great restorer and builder of confidence. Inaction is not only the result, but the cause, of fear. Perhaps the action you take will be successful; perhaps different action or adjustments will have to follow. But any action is better than no action at all.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: Winners are the people who when the odds are stacked against them, and those around them have fallen, will have the courage to look within themselves and make the unbelieveable believeable, and the impossible possible.
author: C. Phillips

quote: When you follow your bliss doors will open where you would not have thought there would be doors; and where there wouldn’t be a door for anyone else.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: Persistent people begin their success where others end in failure.
author: Edward Eggleston

quote: Create a set of great personal values and surround yourself with the right people that can form your support system. Have an optimistic spirit and develop a strong purpose that you completely believe in and everything you can imagine is possible, for you.
author: Andrew Horton

quote: If you’re going through hell, keep going.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Things that are impossible just take longer.
author: Ian Hickson

quote: The darkest hour has only sixty minutes.
author: Morris Mandel

quote: All I would tell people is to hold onto what was individual about themselves, not to allow their ambition for success to cause them to try to imitate the success of others. You’ve got to find it on your own terms.
author: Harrison Ford

quote: Money like health, love, happiness, and all forms of success that you want to create for yourself is the result of living purposefully. It is not a goal unto itself.
author: Dr. Wayne Dyer

quote: We make a living by what we get. We make a life by what we give.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Good instincts usually tell you what to do long before your head has figured it out.
author: Michael Burke

quote: It is good to dream, but it is better to dream and work. Faith is mighty, but action with faith is mightier. Desiring is helpful, but work and desire are invincible.
author: Thomas Robert Gaines

quote: When the bull’s-eye becomes as big in your mind as an elephant, you are sure to hit it.
author: Alejandro Jodorowsky

quote: Failure is the opportunity to begin again more intelligently.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Luck is what happens when preparation meets opportunity.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: The gem cannot be polished without friction, nor man perfected without trials.
author: Chinese proverb

quote: The two things I did learn were that you are as powerful and strong as you allow yourself to be, and that the most difficult part of any endeavor is taking the first step, making the first decision.
author: Robyn Davidson

quote: Whether you be man or woman, you will never do anything in this world without courage. It is the greatest quality of the mind next to honor.
author: James Lane Allen

quote: Optimism is essential to achievement and it is also the foundation of courage and true progress.
author: Nicholas Murray Butler

quote: If successful people have one common trait, it’s an utter lack of cynicism. The world owes them nothing. They go out and find what they need without asking for permission; they’re driven, talented, and work through negatives by focusing on the positives.
author: Mike Zimmerman

quote: To accomplish great things, we must not only act, but also dream; not only plan, but also believe.
author: Anatole France

quote: Trials, temptations, disappointments -- all these are helps instead of hindrances, if one uses them rightly. They not only test the fibre of a character, but strengthen it. Every conquered temptation represents a new fund of moral energy. Every trial endured and weathered in the right spirit makes a soul nobler and stronger than it was before.
author: James Buckham

quote: If you have made mistakes there is always another chance for you... you may have a fresh start any moment you choose, for this thing we call failure is not the falling down, but the staying down.
author: Mary Pickford

quote: Apathy can be overcome by enthusiasm, and enthusiasm can be aroused by two things: first, an idea which takes the imagination by storm; and second, a definite, intelligible plan for carrying that idea into action.
author: Henry Miller

quote: Energy is the essence of life. Every day you decide how you’re going to use it by knowing what you want and what it takes to reach that goal, and by maintaining focus.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Willing is not enough; we must do.
author: Johann von Goethe

quote: Action is where it’s at, as far as making dreams come true. We ourselves are the prime channel for our creations, so if we don’t act but just wait, then we are blocking the channel. If we do act then we will be supported by all that we are connected to... which is All That Is if we act with love and service as our motivation.
author: Peter Shepherd

quote: You are your own most important resource for making your life work. Life rewards action. Until your knowledge, awareness, insights, and understandings are translated into action, they are of no value.
author: Phillip C. McGraw

quote: Be thankful for what you have; you’ll end up having more. If you concentrate on what you don’t have, you will never, ever have enough.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: You don’t get in life what you want. You get what you are.
author: Les Brown

quote: Nothing is more endangered in the modern world than the powerful combination of hard work toward meaningful goals joined with an exuberant embrace of the present moment.
author: Tom Morris

quote: All problems become smaller if you don’t dodge them, but confront them.
author: William F. Halsey

quote: Life is mostly froth and bubble. Two things stand like stone: kindness in another’s trouble, courage in our own.
author: Adam Gordon

quote: It’s easy to be brave from a safe distance.
author: Aesop

quote: It’s not because things are difficult that we do not dare; it’s because we do not dare that they are difficult.
author: Seneca

quote: Experience is a hard teacher because she gives the test first, the lesson afterward.
author: Chinese Proverb

quote: Experience is that marvelous thing that enables you to recognize a mistake when you make it again.
author: F. P. Jones

quote: Only those who do nothing at all make no mistakes... but that would be a mistake.
author: Anonymous

quote: Life is a leap into the unknown. If you want a guarantee, buy a toaster.
author: Bill Harris

quote: Be master of your petty annoyances and conserve your energies for the big, worthwhile things. It isn’t the mountain ahead that wears you out - it’s the grain of sand in your shoe.
author: Robert Service

quote: Destiny is as destiny does. If you believe you have no control, then you have no control.
author: Wess Roberts

quote: Vision without action is a daydream; action without vision is a nightmare.
author: Japanese proverb

quote: Persistence. Nothing in the world can take the place of persistence. Talent will not; nothing is more common than unsuccessful men with talent. Genius will not; unrewarded genius is almost a proverb. Education will not; the world is full of educated derelicts. Persistence and determination alone are omnipotent. The slogan, ‘Press on,’ has solved and always will solve the problems of the human race.
author: Calvin Coolidge (President USA)

quote: Courage is the mastery of fear, not the absence of fear.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Be like a postage stamp. Stick to one thing until you get there.
author: Josh Billings

quote: I couldn’t wait for success....so I went ahead without it.
author: Jonathon Winters

quote: If you can find a path with no obstacles, it probably doesn’t lead anywhere.
author: Frank A. Clark

quote: If you really want to do something, you’ll find a way; if you don’t, you’ll find an excuse.
author: Anonymous
